name: Bob Block Adventures 2
description:
"Pocket Edition" for Android now available!

Bob Block finished eating a sandwich from the Sandwich Shack and now wants a cup of lemonade. You must help him jump, drive, fly, and roll through 7 different levels to reach the lemonade stand, as a cube!

A split-screen multiplayer mode is also available! This includes Bell Block as player 2 and 4 levels.

As a bonus, a remastered version of the original Bob Block is included! This remaster has the updated graphics, a new movement system, and some code optimizations.

Controls:

Player 1:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Player 2:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Right Shift - Jump

Other: 

Escape - Main Menu

R - Character Reset
